HOME.TITLE: TensorBlock
HOME.DESCRIPTION: Building a diverse, active open-source LLM community to drive AI innovation.

FORGE.MASTER_KEY: Your Master Key to the TensorBlock AI Universe
FORGE.DESCRIPTION: Forge removes the friction of multi-provider AI and fragmented tooling, giving you one ultra-secure, high-performance command center to orchestrate everything — from models to services to infrastructure.
FORGE.UNLOCK_POWER: Unlock the full power of AI with Forge.

FEATURES.CENTRALIZED_ACCESS: Centralized access across all models and providers
FEATURES.ORCHESTRATION: Realtime orchestration, fallback, and task routing
FEATURES.SINGLE_KEY: A single Forge Key to access the entire TensorBlock ecosystem

LIGHTNING_FAST.TITLE: Lightning-Fast AI Calls
LIGHTNING_FAST.DESC: Powered by Forge's Dynamic Velocity Engine, with predictive caching and stream-level orchestration

SCALABLE.TITLE: Scalable by Design
SCALABLE.DESC: Handle anything from lightweight interactions to massive agent workloads with near-zero latency

BANK_GRADE.TITLE: Bank-Grade Encryption
BANK_GRADE.DESC: for all your provider keys and credentials

SMART_ROUTING.TITLE: Smart Routing
SMART_ROUTING.DESC: Send tasks to the best provider based on cost, performance, or capability

FALLBACKS.TITLE: Automated Fallbacks
FALLBACKS.DESC: Never miss a request — reroute instantly during outages or slowness

ANALYTICS.TITLE: Granular Usage Analytics
ANALYTICS.DESC: Track usage across all providers, models, and apps

MONITORING.TITLE: Live Cost Monitoring

PERMISSIONS.TITLE: Fine-Grained Permissions

CLI.TITLE: Powerful CLI

TENSORBLOCK.TITLE: TensorBlock-Ready
TENSORBLOCK.DESC: Instantly unlock and orchestrate all TensorBlock services

FUTURE.TITLE: Future-Proof

EXTRA.PASSPORT: Your Passport to the TensorBlock Ecosystem
EXTRA.KEY_DESC_1: Your Forge Key is more than just an API credential
EXTRA.KEY_DESC_2: — it's your secure gateway to everything TensorBlock:
EXTRA.SUMMARY: Forge is your central hub to control, scale, and supercharge your AI stack — securely and intelligently.

BONUS.TITLE: Bonus
BONUS.DESC: With your Forge Key, unlock exclusive early access to cutting-edge models running on TensorBlock Nodes—models you won't find anywhere else in the market.
